title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated secret scanning push protection documentation to specify user access requirements.
Added note that the blocked push URL must be visited by the same user who performed the push.
Clarified that other users attempting to access the URL will receive a `404` error.

generated_title: Clarify user requirement for accessing push protection URL
commits: **7904ce4**: Add note about user requirements for visiting blocked push URL (#56614) (by Ben Webb)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated secret scanning push protection documentation to specify user access requirements.
- Added note that the blocked push URL must be visited by the same user who performed the push.
- Clarified that other users attempting to access the URL will receive a `404` error.

### Title
Clarify user requirement for accessing push protection URL
